name: Chimeric Weasel

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
text: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Chimeric Creation
text: The weasel has glowing eyes that emit bright light out in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden p. 246
